title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, May 23, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of “Goodnight Moon” author Margaret Wise Brown (1910). She was a prolific writer and sometimes kept six different publishers busy at once with her projects.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of “Goodnight Moon” author Margaret Wise Brown (1910). She was a prolific writer and sometimes kept six different publishers busy at once with her projects.
